MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 10:51PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing repairs to broken overhead line equipment and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:55am on 19th November 2020.
